availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Oliver G. Moore (Edmonson County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy Jane Bratton Moore in Edmonson County, Kentucky, on August 23, 1838. Father of Warren Moore, Eliza J. Moore, Sarah Paradine Moore, and Mary A. Moore. Farmer in Edmonson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Sheriff in Edmonson County in 1859. Farmer in Edmonson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 16A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 37.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Edmonson County Marriages, Film 001904232.
Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1859, Legislative Document Series, No. 10 (Frankfort, KY: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1860), 79.
